title.text: Fast and easy language understanding for dialog systems with Microsoft Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)

abstractContent.text: With Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS), developers without machine learning expertise can quickly build and use language understanding models specific to their task.
LUIS is entirely cloud-based: developers log into a web-site, enter a few example utterances and their labels, and then deploy a model to an HTTP endpoint.
Utterances sent to the endpoint are logged and can be efficiently labeled using active learning.
Visualiza-tions help identify issues, which can be resolved by either adding more labels or by giving hints to the machine learner in the form of features.
Altogether, a developer can create and deploy an initial language understanding model in minutes, and easily maintain it as usage of their application grows.
